shapes3d.animation

Class ShapeRotator

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.animation.AbstractVectorChangeAction
      • shapes3d.animation.ShapeRotator

  • public class ShapeRotator
extends AbstractVectorChangeAction
    Class to cause a shape to rotate from one orientation to another over a fixed time period and after an optional delay start time.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShapeRotator(PApplet theApp, Shape3D shape, PVector start, PVector end, float duration, float delay)
      Create and initialise the auto rotator.
